std::list< EventBase * > EventQ
std::map< MetaCode::InputCode,
PollingType > 		ManualCheck
 A unified polling and event repeater the Inputcode is the kind of event to check for each frame. The PollingType is a bitfield used to control what can turn and of the pollingcheck check.

Detailed Description

Used to increase encapsulation, just a bit.

For internal use only.

void phys::internal::EventManagerInternalData::AddInputCodeToManualCheck ( const MetaCode::InputCode &  OneCode,
PollingType  _PollingCheck 
) [inline]

Adds one type of polling check.

For internal use only.

Parameters:
OneCode The code that will be check for each frame, under the new condition
_PollingCheck This is inserted into a new polling check or it is bitwise or'ed into an existing one, and this will trigger other parts of the code to insert event later on

For internal use only.

Parameters:

Member Data Documentation

std::map<MetaCode::InputCode, PollingType> phys::internal::EventManagerInternalData::ManualCheck

A unified polling and event repeater the Inputcode is the kind of event to check for each frame. The PollingType is a bitfield used to control what can turn and of the pollingcheck check.

For internal use only.
